title: How do stop tis messgae "You’re Temporarily Blocked"
content:
I keep getting this annoying message "You’re Temporarily Blocked It looks like you were misusing this feature by going too fast. You’ve been temporarily blocked from using it.

If you think this doesn't go against our Community Standards let us know."


How do I stop it

title: Add-on to easly remove things from the context menu or a simple easy way
content:
Is there a simple easy way to remove items from the right click context menu?

Can someone please make an add on to solve this problem.

I don't want to learn how to use computer code css, I just want to use the browser simply and easily. An add-on or some other button to press is what I would like.
creator: Newfirefoxuser

title: Some sites not working in Friefox.
content: Recently several sites, including Zoom.us and Genesis.com, no longer work in Firefox on my PC running Windows 11. For example, when I log into Zoom spinning wheel indicating the system is working keeps spinning and never lets me enter my password. Yet if I use Edge everything works as it should. I really want to be able to keep using Firefox as my default browser.
